description: This is a plandefinition for Acoustic Tasks Respiratory cohort protocol

action

prefix: 1.8 Task 1

title: Breath Sounds

description: Relax until the task starts.“Take three deep breaths in a row in andout the mouth.”

action

prefix: 1.8 Task 2

title: Voluntary cough

description: “Breathe normally, then when you are ready, cough HARD as if something werestuck in your throat.”Complete this three times.
